trans-unit.source: Represents the permissions that can be granted for file access and operations on memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: Representerar de behörigheter som kan beviljas för åtkomst till filen och åtgärder på minnesmappade filer.

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class specifies the access rights for a memory-mapped file and how access attempts are audited.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MemoryMappedFileSecurity anger åtkomstbehörigheter för en minnesmappad fil och hur åtkomstförsök granskas.

trans-unit.source: This class represents access and audit rights as a set of rules.
trans-unit.target: Den här klassen representerar åtkomst och granskningsprinciper rättigheter som en uppsättning regler.

trans-unit.source: The MemoryMappedFileSecurity class is an abstraction of the underlying Microsoft Windows file security system.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MemoryMappedFileSecurity är en abstraktion av det underliggande Microsoft Windows security filsystemet.

trans-unit.source: It hides many of the details of DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: Många av information om DACL: er och SACL döljs.

trans-unit.source: Use the MemoryMappedFileSecurity class to retrieve, add, or change the access rules that represent the DACL and SACL of a pipe.
trans-unit.target: Använd klassen MemoryMappedFileSecurity hämta, lägga till eller ändra åtkomstregler som representerar DACL och SACL för en pipe.

trans-unit.source: To apply new or changed access or audit rules to a memory-mapped file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill tillämpa nya eller ändrade åtkomst eller granska regler för en minnesmappad fil, använder den <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve access or audit rules from an existing file, use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill hämta åtkomst eller granska regler från en befintlig fil, använder den <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>metoden.</xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.GetAccessControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> methods take a MemoryMappedFileSecurity object as a parameter: - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> - <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>
trans-unit.target: Följande <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>metoder ta ett MemoryMappedFileSecurity-objekt som en parameter:- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29>- <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29></xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateOrOpen%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.SetAccessControl%28System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile%28System.IO.FileStream%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%2CSystem.Boolean%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew%28System.String%2CSystem.Int64%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileOptions%2CSystem.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity%2CSystem.IO.HandleInheritability%29> </xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileSecurity"> </xref> klass.
